name: fullstack_app
description: React and express app to try things out

scripts.build: cd client && npm run build --prod && cd ../api && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others "cd api && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.test: concurrently --kill-others "cd api && npm run start:test" "cd client && npm start" "cypress run"
